siteInfo.name: NandniVerse
siteInfo.description: A space where we explore lifestyle, fashion, and daily life experiences together.

aboutSection.welcomeText: Hey there! I'm Nandni, and welcome to NandniVerse - a space where we explore lifestyle, fashion, and daily life experiences together. Through my channel, I share authentic stories and experiences that resonate with young minds.

mission.title: My Mission
mission.description: I'm on a mission to inspire and empower through authentic content creation.
points: Share meaningful stories that resonate and inspire
Build a supportive community of creators
Create content that makes a positive impact

philosophy.title: Content Philosophy
philosophy.description: My content is guided by these core principles:

contentCategories.description: Daily vlogs, routines, and life experiences

contentCategories.description: Study tips, college life, and educational content

blogPosts.title: Finding Your Style in Fashion
